cards.rule: SACRIFICE all Downgrade cards in your Stable.

cards.name: Unicorgy

cards.name: Hell Neigh!

cards.name: Neigh, Bitch!
cards.rule: Play this card when another player tries to play a card. Stop their player's card from being played and send it to the discard pile.

cards.rule: Play this card when another player tries to play a card. Stop their card from being played and send it to the discard pile.
